mapper.select: SELECT `index` AS `index`, `title` AS `title`, `start_date` AS `startDate`, `end_date` AS `endDate`, `discount_rate` AS `discountRate`, `thumbnail` AS `thumbnail`, `thumbnail_file_name` AS `thumbnailFileName`, `thumbnail_content_type` AS `thumbnailContentType` FROM `terabox`.`events` WHERE `title` = #{title} LIMIT 1
